titleStmt.title: A proclamation for the observation of the nine and twentieth day of May instant, as a day of publick thanksgiving, according to the late act of Parliament for that purpose
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.
England and Wales. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the assigns of John Bill and Christopher Barker ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
At head of title: By the King.
At end of text: Given at our court at Whitehall, the twentieth day of May, in the thirteenth year of our reign, 1661.
